query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as verified_products,
  COUNT(*) - SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unverified_products,
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as verification_rate
FROM products

  COUNT(*) - SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unverified_products,
  ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(description) > 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 1) as verification_rate
FROM products
